csl:
<style xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl" class="in-text" xml:lang="en">
    <citation>
        <layout prefix="[" suffix="]" delimiter="; ">
            <names variable="author" prefix="[X]">
                <name/>
	            <label form="short" prefix=" (" suffix=".)"/>
                <substitute>
                    <names variable="editor"/>
                </substitute>
            </names>
        </layout>
    </citation>
</style>
